text: Mecistes seriatus is a species of leaf beetle found in Saudi Arabia, Mozambique, Swaziland and South Africa. It was first described by the French entomologist Édouard Lefèvre in 1885. ==References== Category:Eumolpinae Category:Beetles of Africa Category:Beetles of Asia Category:Taxa named by Édouard Lefèvre Category:Beetles described in 1885
title: Mecistes seriatus
